Transcription for 996831

Here is the Lord our God, our God, Here, our Jesus, King of God,
Here our refuge for transgressions, Here our hero, free and good.
Here our shelter, by our calling, Here our Spirit fills its nest,
Righteous yet, from heaven shining, Wisely reared, on His rest.
Here our God, our God, Here our refuge for transgressions,
Here our refuge for transgressions, Righteous yet, from heaven shining,
Here our hero, free and good, Righteous yet, from heaven shining,
Righteous yet, from heaven shining, Righteous yet, from heaven shining,
